What version of Thunderbird do you have (help menu > about)

content: your account on outlook is full, you need more space, or to delete some data to free up space.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
For us to better investigate this issue, we will need some more information.

Could you please do the following?

  1. Open the menu > Help > Troubleshooting Information, then click Copy text to Clipboard.
  2. Go to https://pastebin.mozilla.org/, paste the clipboard by right clicking in the large text area, select paste from the menu, change the retention period to expire in 28 days, use the Paste Snippet button to create a page containing your info, then copy the resulting URL (address) of the page created.
  3. Open a reply to this post, and paste the URL to your troubleshooting information you just copied.
  4. Please also provide results for the following test on your system
    • Does Thunderbird work as expected in Thunderbird troubleshooting mode?
    • Does Thunderbird work as expected with your OS started in safe mode with Networking. Instructions for each operating system: Windows 10/11, Windows 8, Windows 7, OSX
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: Invece con grande probabilità è proprio Gmail che rifiuta il tuo accesso. Hai già seguito le indicazioni riportate qui? -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/thunderbird-gmail
creator: @next

content: Ci sono varie segnalazioni aperte nelle ultime ore... Ma dovreste chiedere a Google non qui. Posso solo suggerirti di verificare di aver seguito le procedure riportate qui -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/thunderbird-gmail
creator: @next
